resources.string:
1. Swipe Right or Left to delete note "
"2. Tap on the existing note to edit"
"3. To add new note click Floating Action Button"
"4. To delete all notes click Delete All option in the menu
Developed and Designed By Prathamesh More
Build with the help of the Open Source Libraries

Android Jetpack is a suite of libraries, tools, and guidance to help developers write high-quality apps easier. These components help you follow best practices, free you from writing boilerplate code, and simplify complex tasks, so you can focus on the code you care about.

Room - The Room persistence library provides an abstraction layer over SQLite to allow for more robust database access while harnessing the full power of SQLite."\n"Toasty - Lightweight Android library for a new way to create toasts in Android, similar to Bootstrap alerts.
This is permanent and cannot be undone

Why do so many apps have ads? "\n" I am indie app developer. I need to earn money through my free Apps, so I put ads in the Apps so that I could earn little from the ads. So in order to generate revenue I put Ads in my Apps
